title-1.text: we rely on the right tools.

hero.subtitle: At Social Income, donated tech and software play a crucial role in driving our mission forward.

cards.title: Google Suite
cards.description: We use the tools to organize and communicate. Thanks to Google Nonprofit, this is free for us.

cards.title: GitHub
cards.description: We use GitHub to collaborate on code; without it, maintaining an open-source approach would be difficult.

cards.title: Codemagic
cards.description: We use Codemagic to simplify app builds and reduce deployment complexity.

cards.title: Linktree
cards.description: We use Linktree to keep all our social media links in one accessible place.

cards.title: Twilio
cards.description: We use Twilio to send newsletters and transactional emails to donors, ensuring reliable communication.

cards.title: Algolia
cards.description: We use Algolia to enable fast and accurate search within our admin tool.

cards.title: JetBrains
cards.description: We use JetBrains to write code and review open-source contributions efficiently.

cards.title: 1Password
cards.description: We use 1Password to keep our teamâ€™s credentials secure and easy to access when needed.

cards.title: Mux
cards.description: We use Mux to provide fast and adaptable video experiences to website users.

cards.title: Sentry
cards.description: We use Sentry to monitor, identify, and fix issues across all our tools, improving reliability.

cards.title: Unica77
cards.description: We use Unica77, a donated font by Lineto, to give our platform a distinctive and professional look.

cards.title: FireCMS
cards.description: We use FireCMS to manage our Firestore data and run the admin tool seamlessly.

cards.title: Storybook
cards.description: We use Storybook to maintain a consistent and cohesive design across components.

cards.title: Tailwind CSS
cards.description: We use Tailwind CSS to style quickly and flexibly, adapting to our evolving needs.

cards.title: Shadcn
cards.description: We use Shadcn components because they offer a great balance of simplicity and versatility.

cards.title: TypeScript
cards.description: We use TypeScript to write safer and more maintainable code with fewer bugs.

cards.title: Next.js
cards.description: We use Next.js to deploy our website as fast as possible.
